TopicTitle: How do you think KSP2 will effect the KSP community and etc?

Articles.Content:
How do you think KSP2 will effect the KSP community and etc?

Edited February 17, 2021 by Dr. Kerbal
I think it will Make ksp community bigger along with more players

I personally think KSP is a great game and just needs push in the right direction. Ever since Take Two bought KSP ownership I though KSP would boom in the near future.  Take Two is leading Kerbals to popularity. There is a huge amount of prosperity and greatness that can be accomplished with the game. It has great potential.

Its already popular-ish. KSP has a large following, though the forums may be small, and the fact that KSP2 is the 7th most wish listed game on steam, and the growing media attention, means we will most likely gain in numbers after KSP2 is released. Especially if it is as good as the devs say.
I agree with everything said above. Ig this game is seventh wanted on steam and is going to consoles it is going to be a big boom for ksp

Depends on whether or not it lives up to everybody's expectations we have for it. I'm hoping that the reaction will be good but even still just a little worried

Edited February 18, 2021 by ArtemisAZ
